name: Kongo Pongo
description:
Please note: Flash game requires use of arrow keys! Click on game first so keys do not scroll browser window!

Kongo Pongo was created for the Mini LD#48 Game Jame to fit the theme of "Pong." In this simple game you play a giant ape who knocks back planes on top of a skyscraper... but if one gets by it will try to shoot him off the building! Use left and right arrow keys or mouse buttons to move. Graphics by Kenney - see www.kenney.nl
